statement.p: The \displaystyle\text{pH} scale for acidity is defined by \displaystyle\text{pH}=-{{\log}_{{{10}}}{\left[\text{H}^{+}\right]}} where \displaystyle{\left[\text{H}^{+}\right]}is the concentration of hydrogen ions measured in moles per liter (M).
Calculate the concentration of hydrogen ions in moles per liter (M).
The concentration of hydrogen ions is moles per liter.
